entry.title: Camera Lucida and a tale on two mothers
entry.summary: I've read Roland Barthes' book Camera Lucida

a.title: My mother teaches me riding my bike

img.alt: My mother teaches me riding my bike

p.small: I think my mother taught me riding my bike 1962 when I was six years old. This photo should be more than fifty.

div.p: Camera Lucida is about photography and how Roland Barthes' thought about his mother and how he thinks about memory. For me it was impossible to read it without thinking about mother, my own mother.
